title: DMV Area disconnected from pvp net around 20mins ago.
body: A lot of people in the DMV area were cut off from pvp.net for approx 5mins~ and it ruined a bunch of games and a lot of us got striked as a leaver can there be compensation?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, no compensation can be offered. In the past when stuff like *loss prevention* goes out, it's because the issue was on our end. I wasn't able to find any recorded service issues as of recent, so I assume this issue was caused by either a local ISP or regional network provider incident.

If you're still having issues connecting, please let me know and we can work together to resolve it.
